# init(device:kernelWidth:kernelHeight:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a local contrast normalization kernel.

## Declaration

```swift
init(device: any MTLDevice, kernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The device the kernel will run on.
- **kernelWidth**: The width of the kernel.
- **kernelHeight**: The height of the kernel.

## Return Value

A valid [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSCNNLocalContrastNormalization] object or `nil`, if failure.

## Discussion



## Initializers

- **init(coder:device:)**: Initializes a local contrast normalization kernel.
